TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FabricClient/InfrastructureServiceClient extends System.Object

summary.para: Provides methods for performing infrastructure-specific operations.
This class supports the Service Fabric platform; it is not meant to be called directly from your code.

remarks.para: The InfrastructureService must be enabled before this client can be used. The InfrastructureService is only supported on some infrastructures.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> InvokeInfrastructureCommandAsync (Uri serviceName, string command);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> InvokeInfrastructureCommandAsync(class System.Uri serviceName, string command) cil managed

param.name: serviceName
param.para: The name of the target infrastructure service instance.

param.name: command
param.para: The text of the command to be invoked. The content of the command is infrastructure-specific.

summary.para: Asynchronously invokes an administrative command on the given infrastructure service instance.

returns.para: The response from the infrastructure service. The response format is a JSON string. The contents of the response depend on which command was issued.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> InvokeInfrastructureCommandAsync (Uri serviceName, string command, TimeSpan timeout, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> InvokeInfrastructureCommandAsync(class System.Uri serviceName, string command, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: serviceName
param.para: The name of the target infrastructure service instance.

param.name: command
param.para: The text of the command to be invoked. The content of the command is infrastructure-specific.

param.name: timeout
param.para: The maximum amount of time Service Fabric will allow this operation to continue before returning a .

param.name: cancellationToken
param.para: The optional cancellation token that the operation is observing. It can be used to send a notification that the operation should be canceled. Note that cancellation is advisory and that the operation may still be completed even if it is cancelled.

summary.para: Asynchronously invokes an administrative command on an infrastructure service.

returns.para: The response from the infrastructure service. The response format is a JSON string. The contents of the response depend on which command was issued.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> InvokeInfrastructureQueryAsync (Uri serviceName, string command);

param.name: serviceName
param.para: The name of the target infrastructure service instance.

param.name: command
param.para: The text of the command to be invoked. The content of the command is infrastructure-specific.

summary.para: Asynchronously invokes a read-only query on the given infrastructure service instance.

returns.para: The response from the infrastructure service. The response format is a JSON string. The contents of the response depend on which command was issued.
